name: Shark Sniper
description:
Modifications:

1) I added 3 levels to the game to show off the mechanics of the enemy boat and shark that I included.

2) I redesigned the player's character into boat with death animations, idle animations, and new bullets.

3) I changed the setting of the game from space to ocean. I added a shark enemy, boat enemy, new UI features, and a new background. The shark and boat enemy both have animations.

Created by Joseph Pacentine
